title: Vance says Americans can use TikTok ‘with more confidence’ after Trump signs order transferring ownership in US – live
summary: Former President Trump signed an order allowing TikTok to continue operating in the U.S. This move requires U.S. investors to take over the platform's operations in the country. The decision aims to address national security concerns while keeping the popular app accessible to American users.

title: Aston Villa 1-0 Bologna, Rangers 0-1 Genk, and more: Europa League – live
summary: Daniel Harris will provide updates on Thursday's Europa League matches as Unai Emery's team kicks off their campaign. Fans can expect insights and highlights throughout the games. Stay tuned for the latest developments from the tournament.

title: ‘Heartbroken’: staff laid off as California TV station abruptly closes newsroom
summary: KION-TV has formed a partnership with a CBS affiliate in San Francisco, aiming to enhance content offerings. However, this decision has drawn criticism from workers who argue it undermines the local community's needs. They claim the collaboration represents a disservice to the viewers they are meant to serve.

title: Genk’s Oh Hyeon-gyu seals winning return to Glasgow and deepens Rangers’ gloom
summary: Oh Hyeon-gyu, the former Celtic forward, scored the decisive goal for Genk in their match against Rangers. The game saw Rangers playing with 10 men following Mohamed Diomande's first-half red card. Genk capitalized on their numerical advantage to secure the win.
